segments.source_content: # Verified Company Badge

translations.zh-CN: # 企业认证徽章

segments.source_content: ![Verified Company Badge cover image showing badge display on profile](https://daily-now-res.cloudinary.com/image/upload/v1724771209/docs/Change_log.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![显示个人资料页面上徽章展示的企业认证徽章封面图](https://daily-now-res.cloudinary.com/image/upload/v1724771209/docs/Change_log.png)

segments.source_content: Add a verified company badge to your daily.dev profile to showcase your professional affiliation. This badge includes your company's name and logo and is displayed on your public profile and next to your name whenever you post or comment on the platform.

translations.zh-CN: 在您的daily.dev个人资料中添加企业认证徽章，展示您的职业归属。该徽章包含您公司的名称和标识，会显示在您的公开资料中，并在平台上发帖或评论时出现在您的用户名旁。

segments.source_content:
:::note
We’re currently experiencing a high volume of requests for company verification. We appreciate your patience as we work to process your request as quickly as possible. Thank you for your understanding.
:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note
我们当前正面临大量企业认证请求。感谢您的耐心等待，我们将尽快处理您的申请。感谢您的理解。
:::

segments.source_content: ## Prerequisites

translations.zh-CN: ## 先决条件

segments.source_content: To get a verified company badge, you need access to your work email. Make sure you can receive emails at this address, as you’ll need to verify it during the process.

translations.zh-CN: 要获取企业认证徽章，您需要使用工作邮箱。请确保您能接收该邮箱的邮件，因为在验证过程中需要用到。

segments.source_content: ## Benefits of the Verified Company Badge

translations.zh-CN: ## 企业认证徽章的优势

segments.source_content:
- Showcase your professional affiliation directly on your profile.
- Build credibility by displaying a verified badge that confirms your employment.
- Stand out in discussions with a badge that appears next to your name whenever you post or comment.

translations.zh-CN:
- 直接在个人资料中展示您的职业归属。
- 通过显示认证徽章来建立可信度，确认您的雇佣状态。
- 在讨论中脱颖而出，徽章会在您发帖或评论时显示在用户名旁。

segments.source_content: ## Verified Company Badge Eligibility

translations.zh-CN: ## 企业认证徽章的资格

segments.source_content: To ensure that only legitimate and relevant companies receive a verified company badge, we've outlined the eligibility criteria below.

translations.zh-CN: 为确保只有合法且相关的公司获得企业认证徽章，我们制定了以下资格标准。

segments.source_content: ### Who is eligible for a Verified Company Badge?

translations.zh-CN: ### 谁有资格获得企业认证徽章？

segments.source_content: ✅ Employees with a valid work email from a recognized company domain.

translations.zh-CN: ✅ 使用公司认可域名的工作邮箱的员工。

segments.source_content: ✅ Full-time and part-time employees working directly for a company.

translations.zh-CN: ✅ 直接为公司工作的全职和兼职员工。

segments.source_content: ✅ Contractors working through a company email provided by the employer.

translations.zh-CN: ✅ 通过雇主提供的公司邮箱工作的合同工。

segments.source_content: ✅ Non-commercial organizations, such as non-profits, charities, or government entities.

translations.zh-CN: ✅ 非商业组织，如非营利机构、慈善机构或政府实体。

segments.source_content: ### Who is not eligible for a Verified Company Badge (for now)?

translations.zh-CN: ### 谁目前没有资格获得企业认证徽章？

segments.source_content: ❌ University or academic institution emails.

translations.zh-CN: ❌ 大学或学术机构的邮箱。

segments.source_content: ❌ Freelancers, even if using a unique domain, are not eligible.

translations.zh-CN: ❌ 自由职业者，即使使用独特域名也不符合资格。

segments.source_content: ❌ Personal portfolio sites, regardless of the domain used.

translations.zh-CN: ❌ 个人作品网站，无论使用何种域名。

segments.source_content: ❌ Companies with websites that are not secured (e.g., lacking HTTPS).

translations.zh-CN: ❌ 网站未加密的公司（例如缺少HTTPS）。

segments.source_content: ❌ Companies with websites that fail to provide basic information like contact details, an “About Us” page, and details about their services or products.

translations.zh-CN: ❌ 网站未提供基本信息（如联系方式、“关于我们”页面及服务或产品详情）的公司。

segments.source_content: ❌ Temporary or disposable email addresses.

translations.zh-CN: ❌ 临时或一次性邮箱地址。

segments.source_content: ❌ Shared domain emails (e.g., info@domain.com, admin@domain.com).

translations.zh-CN: ❌ 共享域名的邮箱（例如info@domain.com、admin@domain.com）。

segments.source_content: ❌ Companies with official websites that cannot be accessed for any reason, including broken links, 403 errors, non-secured domains, "under construction" pages, or any other issues that prevent verification of the company's existence.

translations.zh-CN: ❌ 官方网站无法访问的公司，包括链接失效、403错误、未加密域名、“建设中”页面或其他任何妨碍验证公司存在的问题。

segments.source_content: ## How to Get Your Verified Company Badge

translations.zh-CN: ## 如何获取您的企业认证徽章

segments.source_content:
1. Go to your profile and [navigate to Account Details](https://app.daily.dev/account/profile#verified-company-badge).
2. Scroll down to "Verified Company Badge" and enter your work email.
3. Click the arrow button and check your email for the 6-digit verification code.
4. Enter the 6-digit code on daily.dev. If your company is in our database, your badge will be activated automatically. Otherwise, your request will be reviewed and manually approved by our team.

translations.zh-CN:
1. 进入您的个人资料并[导航至账户详情](https://app.daily.dev/account/profile#verified-company-badge)。
2. 滚动至“企业认证徽章”部分并输入您的工作邮箱。
3. 点击箭头按钮并检查您的邮箱以获取6位验证码。
4. 在daily.dev上输入6位验证码。如果您的公司已在我们的数据库中，您的徽章将自动激活。否则，您的请求将由我们的团队审核并手动批准。

segments.source_content: ![Screenshot from account settings showing where to enter the verification code](https://daily-now-res.cloudinary.com/image/upload/v1724771522/docs/SCR-20240827-pwqt.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![账户设置截图，显示输入验证码的位置](https://daily-now-res.cloudinary.com/image/upload/v1724771522/docs/SCR-20240827-pwqt.png)

segments.source_content: ## Troubleshooting

translations.zh-CN: ## 故障排除

segments.source_content: If you encounter any issues while verifying your email or getting your badge, consider the following:

translations.zh-CN: 如果您在验证邮箱或获取徽章时遇到任何问题，请考虑以下建议：

segments.source_content:
- Ensure your work email is correct and check your spam/junk folder if you didn’t receive the verification code.
- Double-check the verification code for accuracy. If it’s incorrect, request a new code.
- If your company isn’t recognized, your request will be reviewed by our team. This process may take several days.
- You can update or remove your work email anytime from the "Verified Company Badge" section in your Account Details.

translations.zh-CN:
- 确保您的工作邮箱地址正确无误，若未收到验证码，请检查垃圾邮件文件夹。
- 仔细核对输入的6位验证码是否准确。若验证失败，可申请重新发送新验证码。
- 若系统未识别您所在公司，我们的团队将对申请进行人工审核，该流程可能需要数个工作日。
- 您可随时通过账户详情页面的"企业认证徽章"板块更新或移除工作邮箱。

segments.source_content: ## Frequently Asked Questions

translations.zh-CN: ## 常见问题解答

segments.source_content:
**Where will my Verified Company Badge be displayed?**  
Your badge will be visible on your public profile and next to your name wherever you post or comment on daily.dev.

translations.zh-CN:
**企业认证徽章会显示在哪些位置？**  
该徽章将展示在您的公开资料页，并在daily.dev平台发帖或评论时显示于用户名旁。

segments.source_content:
**Can I change the email used for verification later?**  
Yes, you can update your work email in the Account Details section and re-verify it to update your badge.

translations.zh-CN:
**后续能否更换验证用的企业邮箱？**  
可以，您只需在账户详情页面更新工作邮箱并重新完成验证即可同步更新徽章信息。

segments.source_content:
**What happens if my company isn’t in the database?**  
If your company isn’t recognized, your request will go through a brief review process.

translations.zh-CN:
**如果我的公司不在系统数据库中会怎样？**  
若系统未收录您所在公司信息，您的申请将进入人工审核流程。

segments.source_content: For further assistance, please contact our support team at [support@daily.dev](mailto:support@daily.dev).

translations.zh-CN: 如需进一步协助，请联系我们的支持团队：[support@daily.dev](mailto:support@daily.dev)。
